caption.title: Model parameters for DLD-1 and RPE-1 p53-/- cells.

tr.td: Proliferation rate of C2 and SC cells
Range estimated from growth curves (not shown)
Range estimated from growth curves (not shown)
Probability of bipolar division in C2 cells
1 - probability of cytokinesis failure (Nicholson et al., 2015)
Probability that a C4cell undergoes bipolar division
Probability of symmetric division in a bipolar division of C4 cell
Probability that a C4 cell deriving from a multipolar division of C4 survives
Death rate of C2 and SC cells
Rates of spontaneous cell death are negligible in both cell lines
Comparable to rate of cell division, because C6 progeny dies due to multipolar division
Probability of getting SC cell from a cytokinesis failure event
Range suggested by Figure 3—figure supplement 1; value obtained from data fitting (Figure 5D, E)
Probability that an SC cell divides symmetrically
Reason for range: the SC subpopulation likely sustains itself via symmetric divisions; value obtained from data fitting (Figure 5D, E)

fn.p: † Parameters that only apply to Model II.
